alert.note: Alert for Sussex; Warren (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 23 at 3:45AM EST until February 25 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex and Warren. In Pennsylvania, Carbon, Monroe and Northampton. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. Localized power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
